news.title: Goldman Sachs sees regulation driving next wave of institutional crypto adoption
news.description: Regulatory clarity and expanding use cases beyond trading are setting the stage for deeper institutional participation in digital assets, the bank said.

news.title: Crypto reps fly to US capitol this week to address market structure bill
news.description: According to The Digital Chamber CEO Cody Carbone, representatives from crypto companies will come to Washington, DC on Thursday to engage with lawmakers and discuss a market structure bill.
news.author: Cointelegraph by Sam Bourgi

news.title: Senate Republicans Schedule Crypto Bill Vote Despite Divide on Key Issues
news.description: The Senate Banking Committee will vote on its crypto market structure bill next week, even as Democrats and Republicans still appear far apart on major sticking points.
news.author: Sander Lutz

news.title: Colombia advances crypto tax rules as global reporting standards take shape
news.description: Colombia’s tax authority has rolled out new reporting requirements for crypto service providers, requiring exchanges to collect and submit user and transaction data starting in 2026.
